text: Deb Fischer (born March 1, 1951 in Lincoln, Nebraska) is the United States Senator from Nebraska. She is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 2013. Fischer is the senior senator from Nebraska. She was in the Nebraska Legislature from 2005 to 2013. Fischer graduated from the University of Nebraskaâ€“Lincoln with a Bachelor of Science degree. She is married to Bruce Fischer. They have three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Deb Fischer, U.S. Senator for Nebraska, Home Page Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lincoln, Nebraska Category:United States senators from Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Nebraska Legislature
title: Deb Fischer
